Package islandtrader.core

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
islandtrader.core.GameEnvironment
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameEnvironmentCmdLine, GameEnvironmentSwing
public abstract class GameEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class with the main methods to allow the game to run only under the required conditions from project scope. The command line application and the GUI application will use the properties defined here along with their own other necessary properties and methods
Author:
Maria Heloisa Balzaretti
